job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongstrongWhat a Software Engineer means to usstrongstrong pulliInternalize the companys goals and vision understanding critical and minimal needs foreseeing potential needs and coming up with solutions that fit the context liliHelp us change the future of work for doctors in America by applying state of the art technology solutions including data API development modern integration patterns frameworks for building beautiful responsive applications machine learning natural language processing and explicable AI  in partnership with key partners liliSupport all business lines including sales and business development by enabling those teams while balancing competing goals and making difficult tradeoffs when required liliPartner effectively with Product User Experience Growth and Operations toward building bestinclass systems to give our physician partners insight into their patient panels liliSupport the technology needs of various departments by creating a dataliterate ecosystem and helping the wider organization understand how the technology helps them and how to think about their initiatives in terms of our capabilities liulstrongstrongWho you arestrongstrongulliWorking with team members with a diverse background is important to you and you value and thrive being exposed to different perspectives lili18 years of experience in performing resultsdriven development in a collaborative environment liliPreferably have a degree in computer science engineering applied math or a related field or have demonstrated significant growth and impact as an engineer regardless of your education liliExperienced investing time before building to ensure you come up with a pragmatic design that has buyin and where you are able to best use your teammates strengths and feedback liliA proven ability to conduct research and internalize user needs in partnership with Product and User Experience liliAble to adjust the level of specificity and context for different audiences either in the interest of achieving common goals efficiently or to educate others liliThoughtful collaborator with a deep appreciation for systems design and a passion for building amazing and powerful experiences while knowing the tradeoffs of moving quickly and getting things working vs going deep and perfecting a product for the longterm liliHave experience in highly regulated environments and be mindful about privacy and security of our customers data liliHealthcare or insurance or fintech experience is preferred but tell us why you are passionate about our mission liliFor data engineers  experience in Python relational databases and data warehouses business intelligence tools containers cloud platforms command line scripting is desirable liliFor web backend engineers  experience in Python relational databases cloud platforms is desirable liliFor web frontend engineers  experience in React JavascriptTypescript CSS cloud platforms is desirable liliA plus  not afraid to dive into devops as needed and help us iterate on an efficient builddeploy process and a solid infrastructure liliExperience with startups is not necessary but you should be looking forward to bringing order power and role definition to an initial blank slateliul
